meanings.sent1: The riverbank became siltier after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The siltier soil was perfect for growing certain plants.
meanings.sent3: The siltier path made it tricky to walk without slipping.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt siltier with each scoop of mud.
meanings.sent5: The siltier water flowed slowly, carrying sediment downstream.

meanings.definition: Having a higher proportion of silt compared to other substances.
meanings.sent1: The siltier mixture settled at the bottom of the container.
meanings.sent2: The siltier sand was ideal for building sandcastles.
meanings.sent3: The siltier paint gave the walls an interesting texture.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded siltier after spending hours in the dusty room.
meanings.sent5: The siltier layer in the jar separated from the rest over time.
